artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Sasaki Toyokichi; Carver: Wada Yūjirō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
life_date: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi, Japanese, 1839–1892; Sasaki Toyokichi, Publisher; Wada Yūjirō, Carver, Japanese, 1857–1905
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年之印 {Yoshitoshi no in} | Carver’s seal: 和田刀 {Wada tō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Collection of Thirty-six Ghosts in New Style (Shinkei sanjūrokkaisen 新形三十六怪撰)
title: Akugenda Yoshihira’s Ghost Attacking Nanba Jirō at the Nunobiki Waterfall
